did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Ephemera from "The future of the queer past: a transnational history conference," The University of Chicago, Sept. 14-17, 2000.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Conference program, notes on conference sessions, publisher and archives' catalogs distributed there, and catalog for the exhibit "Homosexuality in the City: A Century of Research at the University of Chicago," which coincided with the conference held September 14-17, 2000.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Conference program, notes on conference sessions, publisher and archives' catalogs distributed there, and catalog for the exhibit "Homosexuality in the City: A Century of Research at the University of Chicago," which coincided with the conference held September 14-17, 2000.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Ephemera from "The future of the queer past: a transnational history conference," The University of Chicago, #7653. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
